widgets.title: Applications : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction   SELECT     uniquecount(appName) AS '' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP'

widgets.title: Application Locations
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction   SELECT     filter(uniquecount(appName), WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS' ) AS 'Total Apps',  filter(uniquecount(appName), WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP') AS 'On-Premises',  filter(uniquecount(appName), WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS') AS 'AWS'

widgets.title: Applications : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction   SELECT     uniquecount(appName) AS '' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'

widgets.title: Application Locations
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction  SELECT uniqueCount(appName) AS 'Applications'  FACET cases(  WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' as 'On-Premises',      WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' as 'AWS')

widgets.title: Top Applications by Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction  SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Applications by Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction  SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com'  FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Applications by Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction  SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions' WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS')  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Server : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com') AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com'  FACET host

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Server : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET host

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Server : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS')  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET host

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS')  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Routine : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET name

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Routine : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com'  FACET name

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Routine : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS')  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET name

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Type : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com'  FACET transactionType

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Type : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET transactionType

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by Type : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS')  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET transactionType

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by SubType : On-Premise
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET transactionSubType

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by SubType : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS'  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET transactionSubType

widgets.title: Top Application Utilization by SubType : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Transactions'  WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS')  AND username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' FACET transactionSubType

widgets.title: Top Application Errors : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET appName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Transaction : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET transactionName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Transaction : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET transactionName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Transaction : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET transactionName

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Host : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET host

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Host : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET host

widgets.title: Top Application Errors by Host : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET host
